result.name: oracle-hrms
result.notes: Database containing personal details of all staff at the Prison Service and National Offender Management Service. Such as name, age, address and bank account details. Also includes performance ratings and professional accreditation markings where applicable.

organization.name: ministry-of-justice
organization.title: Ministry of Justice
organization.description:
We work to protect the public and reduce reoffending, and to provide a more effective, transparent and responsive criminal justice system for victims and the public.

MOJ is a ministerial department, supported by 37 agencies and public bodies.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/ministry-of-justice

result.title: ORACLE HRMS  (Prison Service and Noms HR record database)

extras.value: Information from Oracle HR is used in the contributions to the Quarterly Public Sector Employment Survey and Annual Civil service Employment Survey which are used by Office for National Statistics to produce statistical publications.
